description: Number of distinct vampire numbers (definition 2) having 2n digits.
references: C. A. Pickover, "Vampire Numbers." Ch. 30 in Keys to Infinity. New York: Wiley, pp. 227-231, 1995.
links: Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Vampire Number.
author: _Eric W. Weisstein_
extensions: More terms from _Jens Kruse Andersen_, Dec 01 2002
